reviews.text: Absolutely delicious food, attractive decor, and very gracious and attentive service. My first time here but definitely not the last! I can't wait to go back...

If you are looking for a low-sodium Southern Asian curry, this is the place. Not sure if it's intentional but the food, mainly curries, taste less salty than any other curries I have ever tried. It's not that it's not good, I can still taste other spice in the curry and it's still delicious, but just surprised that the sodium content seems lower than usual, which is definitely a good thing!
This place has such a warm vibe of home Nepal. All the food ware tasty. Momos are great too. Our host was funny and cute.
Very tasty! Cooked just the way you like it. Great flavor and generous portions.
sweet little spot. excellent food & service.  himalayan is a little milder than indian counterpart, but still full of flavor.  try unusual specials!

The large central town square in Gyumri, Armenia. It is bordered by the Abovyan street from the west, Gai street from the north, Shahumyan street from the east and Vahan Cheraz street from the south. It has a rectangular shape (280 by 140 meters).
The square was known as the May Uprising Square, named after the failed Bolshevik uprising against the Dashnak government of the First Republic of Armenia in May 1920. The square was opened during the 1930s under the Soviet rule, based on the original plan of Alexander Tamanian and the revised plan of D. Chislian.
Ponchik monchik,norlav tex e erexaneri het ponchik utelu hamar.
